subject: p19907884
History: Postoperative fever, to assess for pneumonia.
Findings: In comparison with the study of, the monitoring and support devices have been removed. Continued low lung volumes but no definite evidence of pneumonia, pleural effusion, or vascular congestion. As on the prior study, there is some poor definition of the right heart border that could well represent crowding of vessels.
